name: sic-landing-pages
description: Accessible Landing Pages for Sigma Clinic with SCSS, JS, HTML

scripts.build:static: npm-run-all scss:build js:build copy:css copy:js copy:map
scripts.build:index: npm-run-all scss:build-index js:build copy:css-index copy:js copy:map-index
scripts.build:index2: npm-run-all scss:build-index2 js:build copy:css-index2 copy:js copy:map-index2
scripts.scss:build-nosource: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map --style=compressed && postcss dist/style.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/style.css
scripts.scss:build: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.css --style=compressed && postcss dist/style.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/style.css
scripts.scss:build-index: sass scss/style-index.scss dist/style-index.css --style=compressed && postcss dist/style-index.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/style-index.css
scripts.scss:build-index2: sass scss/style-index2.scss dist/style-index2.css --style=compressed && postcss dist/style-index2.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/style-index2.css
